PHRASE.LANG: Friends getting on your nerves? Being loud and unruly? Send Gribbler round, he'll sort them out! [#Legal]
Des amis qui vous tapent sur les nerfs ? Trop bruyants et indisciplinés ? Il va s'en occuper ! [#Legal]
Gehen dir deine Freunde auf die Nerven? Sind sie zu laut und frech? Dann lass Gribbler los, er kümmert sich schon um sie! [#Legal]
Gli amici ti fanno innervosire? Fanno chiasso e ti disturbano? Mandagli Gribbler, lui saprà come risolvere le cose! [#Legal]
Los amigos te ponen de los nervios. Son ruidosos, revoltosos. ¡Envíales a Gribbler, se encargará de ellos! [#Legal]
신경을 거스르는 친구들이 있다구요? 시끄럽고 제멋대로라구요? 그리블러를 보내세요, 녀석이 잘 정리해 줄 겁니다! [#Legal]
Friends getting on your nerves? Being loud and unruly? Send Gribbler round, he'll sort them out! [#Legal]
好友讓你火大嗎？講話大聲又沒規矩嗎？派出貪吃龍就能把他們搞定！ [#Legal]
好友讓你火大嗎？講話大聲又沒規矩嗎？派出貪吃龍就能把他們搞定！ [#Legal]
Friends getting on your nerves? Being loud and unruly? Send Gribbler round, he'll sort them out! [#Legal]
